title: urudi tArAyO
sahitya:
urudi tArAyO paramA urudi tArAyO anbin urudi tArAyO


caraNam 1    tuLLu manattinai uLLat-taDakka duSTa pulanukku shUDu koDukka
kaLLar shUzh kAmAdi kATTai erikkak-kAdalaip-pUraNa jyOtiyil uittiDa
    caraNam 2  			(rAgA:  sAvEri)Aa:S R1 M1 P D1 S  Av:  S N3 D1 P M1 G3 R1 S  bOdhi aDiyinil buddhar perumAn poyyarak-kaNDadOr meyyaram paTrit
tIdarananmai sezhittaruLOnga cittam nilaittu dhyAnam kai kUDiya
    caraNam 3  			(rAgA:  dhanyAsi)Aa:S G2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 D1 P M1 G2 R1 S  dInar pirAnenum Esu kristu ceppiya shendaNmai meippaDa vAzhvil
jnAnap-porumai siluvaiyait-tAngi jnAlattil vAnulagATSiyai nATTiDa
    caraNam 4  			(rAgA:  tODi)Aa:S R1 G2 M1 P D1 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D1 P M1 G2 R1 S  hIrAg-guhaiyil muhammadu sallam innuyir yAvaiyum inburap-prTra
mArAda bhaktiyai rAkkiyat-tI en manadil ezhundiDa  vAzhvu polindiDa
    caraNam 5  			(rAgA:  shrI)Aa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 P D2 N2 P M1 R2 G2 R2 S  pArkkaDalirp-paLLi koNDadu pOdum pAranik-kAttiDa vArum viraindE
 nATrishaiyum dharma nAda sangUdum nAraNarE harinAraNarE ena
    caraNam 6  			(rAgA:  bhairavi)Aa:S R2 G2 M1 P D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D1 P M1 G2 R2 S  en mukham pArttaruL SaNmukha duraiyE Erum aNuguNDup-pOrai ozhikkat-
taNmukham pArttaruL sankaTam tIra shaktivEl shaktivEl enriDa
    caraNam 7  			(rAgA:  mOhana)Aa:S R2 G3 P D2 S  Av:  S D2 P G3 R2 S  vAnam panimalar vArttu vaNangum mahAshakti gauri malaivaLar tAyai
jnAnamalar tUvi nAm anbu sheidE nADellAm vAzhvOr nal varam peTriDa
    caraNam 8  			(rAgA:  aThANA)Aa:S R2 M1 P N3 S  Av:  S N3 D2 P M1 P G3 R2 S  viNNinaik-konjiDum veLLi malaimEl mEvum sadAshiva vEndanaik-kaNDEn
kaNNAra nIr malgik-kAdal perugik-kanindu paNindu kalandu kaLittiDa
